title: Share of global net sales of Luxottica by geographical area 2018
summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Geographical area, and Share of net sales in each Geographical area on the y axis.
The Share of net sales is highest at Geographical area North America and lowest at Geographical area Rest of the world.
The difference of Share of net sales between the highest and lowest Geographical area is 56.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Geographical area in the x axis and Share of net sales in the y axis.
Geographical area North America has the highest Share of net sales and Rest of the world has the lowest Share of net sales.
